entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Fog patches. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
